name: Ceramic Vase
description: Handcrafted ceramic vase with a unique geometric design

name: Scented Candle
description: Soy wax scented candle in a stylish glass jar with a floral fragrance

name: Linen Pillow
description: Soft linen pillow cover with a striped pattern and a down feather insert

name: Elegant Glass Vase
description: This stunning glass vase features a unique diamond pattern that reflects light beautifully. It's perfect for displaying fresh flowers or as a statement piece on its own.

name: Rustic Wooden Tray
description: This handcrafted wooden tray is perfect for serving drinks or displaying candles. Its rustic design features a distressed finish and metal handles for easy carrying.

name: Cozy Knit Throw
description: This soft and cozy knit throw is perfect for snuggling up on the couch or adding a pop of color to your bedding. Its chunky knit design and tassels make it a stylish addition to any room.

name: Ceramic Dinnerware Set
description: This elegant set includes dinner plates, salad plates, and bowls. Made from high-quality ceramic, each piece is glazed with a beautiful speckled pattern.

name: Glass Tumblers
description: These stylish tumblers are perfect for serving juice, water, or cocktails. Made from high-quality glass, they feature a unique textured design that adds a touch of sophistication to any table setting.

name: Stainless Steel Flatware Set
description: This sleek  Made from high-quality stainless steel, each piece features a simple and elegant design.

name: Vintage Ceramic Dinner Plates
description: Set of 4 vintage ceramic dinner plates in blue and white floral design.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: 16oz stainless steel water bottle with a double-walled vacuum seal.

name: Floral Print Cotton Duvet Cover
description: Queen size duvet cover in a floral print made of 100% cotton.

name: Cast Iron Skillet
description: 10-inch cast iron skillet with a pre-seasoned surface.

name: Faux Leather Ottoman
description: Square-shaped faux leather ottoman in dark brown color.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board
description: Large bamboo cutting board with juice groove and non-slip feet.

name: Handwoven Cotton Rug
description: 5x8 handwoven cotton rug in shades of blue and white.
